vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time before the Flood, first mentioned at Gen.2.19;
married to Eve (H2332);
father of: Cain (H7014B), Abel (H1893) and Seth (H8352); also translated "man" at Gen.2.19,21,23; 3.8,9,20; 5.2; "mankind" at Deu.32.8; "others" at Job.31.33;
§ Adam = "red"
1) first man
2) city in Jordan valley
vocabinfos._es_Definition: Adán o Adam = "hombre o ser humano", "rojo o rojizo"     el primer hombre, una ciudad cerca Jordán
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞當
1) 上帝所創造的第一個人
2) 約旦谷地的城市 (書 3:16)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
亚当
1) 上帝所创造的第一个人
2) 约旦谷地的城市 (书 3:16)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
§ Adam = "red"
This name is used for:
1) first man
2) city in Jordan valley
